content: At chess, a pawn that reaches the last row ahead is promoted to a queen. At checkers, a checker that realizes an identical feat is promoted to a king.
translations: ita:Negli scacchi, un pedone che raggiunge l'ultima fila di fronte sar√† promosso a regina (donna). Nella dama, un pezzo che
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
